prng.generator

Class NistHmacRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SecureRandomSpi
      • prng.generator.BaseRandom
        • prng.generator.NistHmacRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NistHmacRandom.RandomHmacSHA1, NistHmacRandom.RandomHmacSHA256, NistHmacRandom.RandomHmacSHA512

    public class NistHmacRandom
extends BaseRandom
    An implementation of the NIST HMAC-based Deterministic Random Number Generator as defined in SP800-90A.
    Author:
    Simon Greatrix
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • NistHmacRandom

        public NistHmacRandom(SeedSource source,
                      HashSpec spec,
                      int resistance,
                      byte[] entropy,
                      byte[] nonce,
                      byte[] personalization)
        Create a new deterministic random number generator
        Parameters:
        source - entropy source (null means use the default source)
        spec - digest specification (required)
        resistance - number of operations between reseeds. Zero reseeds on every operation, one reseeds on every alternate operation, and so on.
        entropy - optional initial entropy
        nonce - an optional nonce
        personalization - an optional personalization value
